name: Into the Beast (2018)
description:
A game where the main antagonist is the environment itself. There are no traditional bad guys or enemies that come up and hit you. It's nothing but pure mind games. Try to find your way out as the rooms try to trick you into traps. 

Disclaimer: This is a very short game, so don't expect something too incredibly amazing. A very good computer that can process graphics quickly is also needed. 

Gameplay/Walkthrough Video:


*This is a school assignment and it is very short.
